mapper.select: select count(*) from apv a,apv_mid m,emp e where a.apv_mid = m.apv_mid and a.apv_snd = e.emp_num and (m.apv_mid_emp = #{rcv_num} or a.apv_fnl = #{rcv_num})

select * from (select rownum rn, q.* from (select b.* from (select a1.*,e1.emp_name as srt_name from apv a1,apv_mid m,emp e1 where a1.apv_mid = m.apv_mid and a1.apv_snd = e1.emp_num and m.apv_mid_emp = #{apv_mid_emp} union select a2.*,e2.emp_name as srt_name from apv a2,emp e2 where a2.apv_snd = e2.emp_num and a2.apv_fnl = #{apv_mid_emp} ) b order by DECODE(b.apv_ok, 0, 1), DECODE(b.apv_ok, 1, 2), DECODE(b.apv_ok, 2, 3), DECODE(b.apv_ok, 4, 4), DECODE(b.apv_ok, 3, 5), b.apv_date desc ) q ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from apv a,apv_mid m,emp e where a.apv_mid = m.apv_mid and a.apv_snd = e.emp_num and a.apv_snd = #{snd_num}

select * from (select rownum rn, b.* from (select a.*,e.emp_name as srt_name from apv a,emp e where a.apv_snd = e.emp_num and a.apv_snd = #{apv_snd} order by DECODE(a.apv_ok, 4, 1), DECODE(a.apv_ok, 1, 2), DECODE(a.apv_ok, 2, 3), DECODE(a.apv_ok, 0, 4), DECODE(a.apv_ok, 3, 5), a.apv_date desc ) b ) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select emp_num,emp_name from emp where team_num = (select team_num from emp where emp_num = #{emp_num}) and rnk_num = (select code from comm where content = '대리') and ref = 0
select emp_num,emp_name from emp where team_num = (select team_num from emp where emp_num = #{emp_num}) and rnk_num = (select code from comm where content = '팀장')
select emp_num,emp_name from emp where dep_num = (select dep_num from emp where emp_num = #{emp_num}) and rnk_num = (select code from comm where content = '부장')
select emp_num,emp_name from emp where dep_num = (select code from comm where content = '임원') and rnk_num != 210 and ref = 0
select emp_num,emp_name from emp where dep_num = (select code from comm where content = '총무부') and rnk_num = (select code from comm where content = #{rnk}) and ref = 0
select emp_num,emp_name from emp where dep_num = (select code from comm where content = '총무부') and rnk_num = (select code from comm where content = '부장')
mapper.insert: insert into apv values ((select nvl(max(apv_sq),0)+1 from apv),#{apv_type},#{apv_snd},'',#{apv_fnl},#{apv_title},#{apv_content},'','',sysdate,'',0)
mapper.select: select nvl(max(apv_mid_num),0) from apv_mid where apv_mid = #{apv_sq} and apv_mid_emp = #{rcv_num}

select a.*,m.*,e1.emp_name as srt_name ,e2.emp_name as rcv_name ,c1.content as srt_dep, c2.content as srt_rnk from apv a , apv_mid m , emp e1, emp e2,comm c1, comm c2 where a.apv_mid = m.apv_mid and a.apv_snd = e1.emp_num and m.apv_mid_emp = e2.emp_num and e1.dep_num = c1.code and e1.rnk_num = c2.code and m.apv_mid = #{apv_sq} and apv_mid_emp = #{rcv_num}

select a.*,e1.emp_name as srt_name ,e2.emp_name as rcv_name ,c1.content as srt_dep, c2.content as srt_rnk from apv a,emp e1,emp e2 ,comm c1, comm c2 where a.apv_snd = e1.emp_num and a.apv_fnl = e2.emp_num and e1.dep_num = c1.code and e1.rnk_num = c2.code and a.apv_sq = #{apv_sq} and a.apv_fnl = #{rcv_num}
mapper.update: update apv set apv_ok = 3 where apv_sq = #{apv_sq}
update apv set apv_no = #{apv_no} , apv_ok = 4 where apv_sq = #{apv_sq}
mapper.select: select b.* from (select e.emp_name as rcv_name, a.apv_ok,(select 0 from dual) as apv_mid_num from apv a ,emp e where a.apv_snd = e.emp_num and apv_sq = #{apv_sq} union select e.emp_name as rcv_name, m.apv_mid_ok as apv_ok,m.apv_mid_num from apv a,apv_mid m,emp e where a.apv_mid = m.apv_mid and e.emp_num = m.apv_mid_emp and m.apv_mid = #{apv_sq} union select e.emp_name as rcv_name, a.apv_ok,(select max(apv_mid_num)+1 from apv_mid where apv_mid = #{apv_sq}) as apv_mid_num from apv a ,emp e where a.apv_fnl = e.emp_num and apv_sq = #{apv_sq} ) b order by b.apv_mid_num
